jobs.name: Content AI
jobs.prompt_template: Generate marketing content for today. Focus on privacy-first technology.

jobs.name: Market Intelligence
jobs.prompt_template: Provide a market intelligence briefing covering AI tools and privacy technology trends.

jobs.name: Crypto Analyst
jobs.prompt_template: Analyze current crypto market conditions. Focus on BTC, ETH, SOL. Include price, 24h change, volume.
